revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=TL-WA801ND |revision=v2 |asin=B004UBU8IE |fcc_date=09/21/2012 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Proware |availability=common |type=access point |fcc_id=TE7WA801NDV2 |ic_id=8853A-WA801ND |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=0.85 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=passive |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR9341;AR9341-AL1A; |cpu1_cspeed=535 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=cFeon |fla1_model=EN25Q32B-104HIP |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9425G6JH-5 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9341;AR9341-AL1A; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.0.254 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|N300 Wireless Access Point}}
*Access Point/Client/Bridge/Repeater Mode :''300Mbps 2.4GHz, 802.11b/g/n, 2x 4dBi, Passive PoE''
"1112202'''801-2.0'''" and "Rev:1.0sp2" is silkscreened on the board.
The default pattern for this device is ''TP-LINK_XXXXXX'' (where ''XXXXXX'' is :the last three octets of the wireless interface MAC [uppercase letters]). This device would appear to be using an [[Atheros]] AR934x WiSoC (AR9341).
*[https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/tl-wa801nd ''TP-LINK TL-WA801ND'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=743511 ''TP-LINK TL-WA801ND v2'' on '''DD-WRT''' forums] :SoC: [[Atheros]] AR9341-AL1A (PHU988.00B, 1228 Taiwan) :Flash: ''cFeon'' Q32B-104HIP (AJH096B7, 1227TMA) :RAM: ''Winbond'' W9425G6JH-5 (1225H, 62087R100) :: or ''Zentel'' A3S56D40FTP-G5 (32MB)
